entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 7:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -20.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -25.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries over northern sections late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries over northern sections in the evening. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
